search_results.snippet:
THE GRAMMYS | This singer's win at the 51st Grammys was an emotional 
moment ... He had something simple & eloquent to say in 2009 when he won for "
Say"...
search_results.title: jeopardy/3298_Qs.txt at master  jedoublen/jeopardy  GitHub

question: He had something simple & eloquent to say in 2009 when he won for "Say""I just--I love making music, and I hope you all do, too.  It's the best thing in the world.  Thank you very much.  Thank you."
